violations: Missing PPE: No hard hats or gloves.
Worker in dangerous position: Close proximity to open machinery.
Improper equipment usage: No protective barriers around machinery.
locations: Center of the image near the machinery.
Right side where the worker is operating the machine.
recommendations: Provide and enforce the use of hard hats, gloves, and other necessary PPE.
Ensure that workers maintain a safe distance from running machinery and use protective barriers.
Implement barriers or guards to separate operators from equipment in operation.
worker_positions: One worker near the center with machinery
One worker on the right operating the machine
